title: Renewable energy capacity - country ranking 2018
summary: This statistic depicts the Capacity gigawatts of the capacity country in selected countries with gigawatts in the India France in 2018 , based on a cost gigawatts .
Capacity gigawatts in all selected countries were less than in the India France , with gigawatts in China being 17.1 % less than in the India France .
gold: The leading countries for installed renewable energy in 2018 were China , the U.S. , and Brazil . China was leading in renewable energy installations with a capacity of around 696 gigawatts . The U.S. , in second place , had a capacity of around 245 gigawatts .
